__e: Is there some reason why you and I aren't supposed to be talking?
You know, it's funny we can talk this way, isn't it?
I want you to understand my work so that I can talk with you.
I'll go on to the villa to prepare some food while you go and change some money. We've almost run out.
Frank, the feds don't know you're inside, and they won't know until we're ready to leave.
Maybe longer before we're able to go to bed with someone new.
Why don't I get two chairs, and then we can both sit.
We all have to lose ourselves sometimes... to find ourselves, don't you think?
Is there some reason why you and I aren't supposed to be talking?
Man, I am telling you. I mean, here I am reading up on how to prepare food... so that we can run this diner properly... and that's the thanks I get.
Isn't there some way we can get together on this?
It's too bad we can't work together.
Three years we are helplessly in Keith ago.
Wonderful what we can do nowadays.
